text: The Encs District (Hungarian: Encsi járás) is a district in the northern part of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County. Encs is also the name of the town where the district seat is found. Its population in 2022 was 21,059. == Municipalities == The district has 1 town and 28 villages. * Alsógagy * Baktakék * Beret * Büttös * Csenyéte * Csobád * Detek * Encs – district seat * Fáj * Fancsal * Felsőgagy * Forró * Fulókércs * Gagyapáti * Garadna * Hernádpetri * Hernádszentandrás * Hernádvécse * Ináncs * Kány * Keresztéte * Krasznokvajda * Litka * Méra * Novajidrány * Perecse * Pusztaradvány * Szalaszend * Szemere The bolded municipality is the city.
title: Encs District
